info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cleveland, southwestern Gaston, northwestern York and Cherokee Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles east of Shelby to 5 miles southwest of Gaffney. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gastonia, Shelby, Gaffney, Kings Mountain, Bessemer City, Blacksburg, Grover, Patterson Springs and Hickory Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
